Bhutan and Indonesia will lock horns in the 6th T20I of Quadrangular T20I Series in Bhutan 2024 on Tuesday, 22 October 2024, at Gelephu International Cricket Ground, Gelephu.
Bhutan have played 2 matches in the series and are currently ranked third on the points table, while Indonesia have also played 2 matches and are ranked fourth.

Both teams last played against each other in the Match 5 of the ACC Men's T20I Challenger Cup, 2024 where Tenzin Wangchuk scored the highest fantasy points for Bhutan with 106 match fantasy points while Kadek Gamantika topped the fantasy points leaderboard for Indonesia with 99 match fantasy points.

In the only match played between these 2 teams, Bhutan lost against Indonesia. Indonesia All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while Bowlers have earned the most fantasy points for Bhutan.
Bhutan vs Indonesia head-to-head in T20I: Total Matches Played: 2, Bhutan Won: 0, Indonesia Won: 2, No Result: 0, Tied: 0.

The pitch at the Gelephu International Cricket Ground, Gelephu will assist the bowlers. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 4 matches is 106 runs. Both teams will look to chase upon winning the toss as the majority of the games played on this ground have been won by the side chasing.
Case 1: If Bhutan bats first, First Innings score prediction: Bhutan will score 120-130, Result prediction: Bhutan will win the match by 10-20 runs.
Case 2: If Indonesia bats first, First Innings score prediction: Indonesia will score 100-110, Result prediction: Bhutan will win the match by 5 wickets.
In the last match played by Bhutan against Maldives, Bhutan beat Maldives by 4 wickets. The top fantasy player for Bhutan was Jigme Singye who scored 74 fantasy points.
In their last match in this series against Thailand, Thailand beat Indonesia by 6 wickets. The top fantasy player for Indonesia was Ketut Artawan who scored 45 fantasy points.
Bhutan's Predicted XI: Tshering Tashi, Ranjung Mikyo Dorji, Tenjin Rabgey, Karma Dorji, Gakul Ghalley, Thinley Jamtsho, Suprit Pradhan, Tenzin Wangchuk, Jigme Singye, Namgay Thinley, Sonam Yeshey.

Indonesia's Predicted XI: Ahmad Ramdoni (WK), Dharma kadek kesuma, Anjar Tadarus, Gede Arta, Gede Priandana, Febrianto Heo, Danilson Hawoe, Dewa Gede Andika Pradipta Diatmika Wiswin, Ferdinando Banunaek, Ketut Ediguna Artawan, Julang Dzullfikar.
The 6th T20I of the Quadrangular T20I Series in Bhutan 2024 will see the clash between Bhutan and Indonesia at the Gelephu International Cricket Ground, Gelephu on Tuesday, 22 October 2024.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
